messages.subject: Re: Any conferences ??
messages.msgSnippet: Lynn, If you are in Northern VA, there will be a conference in Maryland (between Baltimore and Annapolis) on Saturday, April 5. Go to
messages.messageBody:
Lynn,

If you are in Northern VA, there will be a conference in Maryland
(between Baltimore and Annapolis) on Saturday, April 5.

Go to http://www.mhea.com/conference.htm for details.

It tends to be a very unschooling friendly conference so don't be
mislead by the keynote speaker being Jesse Wise, author of The Well
Trained Mind ;-)

Billy
www.FUN-Books.com

See ya' then? <g>

~Kelly
